short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Space-Tab extension changes adds unique space backgrounds to your new tab page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enjoy inspiring space backgrounds in your new tab.

Get quick access to beautiful space imagery.

This extension provides easy access to breathtaking space backgrounds for your new tab, alongside quick web searches, right from your new tab.

By clicking "Add to Chrome", I accept and agree to installing the 'Space Backgrounds' extension and setting Chrome New Tab search provider to Microsoft Bing as described by the service in the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.

Uninstall Instructions: https://www.space-tab.xyz/uninstall.html 
EULA/Terms of Use: https://www.space-tab.xyz/terms.html 
Privacy Policy: https://www.space-tab.xyz/policy.html 
Contact Us: http://www.space-tab.xyz/terms.html#terms-contact

To remove our extension from Google Chrome:

Click on the three horizontal lines icon in the upper right-hand corner of your Chrome browser. 
2) Go to "Settings". 
3) In the menu that appears click on "Extensions". 
4) From the list of installed Extensions, find the name of the toolbar extension you wish to uninstall. 
5) Click on the trash can icon to the right of "Enable" (for the toolbar extension you wish to uninstall). 
6) Close your browser completely and reopen it. Our toolbar extension should be removed from your Chrome browser.
